breaking_changes.title: Refactor TearsheetConfig.charts to chart objects (drop chart_args) (#3398)
breaking_changes.message:
Refactor TearsheetConfig.charts to chart objects (drop chart_args) (#3398)

BREAKING: `TearsheetConfig.charts` now takes chart objects instead of strings; `chart_args` removed.

breaking_changes.title: Align Rust data commands with Python and fix book flow
breaking_changes.message:
Align Rust data commands with Python and fix book flow

- Add correlation_id field to all Subscribe/Unsubscribe command structs
- Fix BookUpdater to handle direct OrderBookDeltas/Depth10 from msgbus
- Forward BookSnapshots subscriptions to client as BookDeltas with link
- Track direct deltas subscriptions separately from snapshot-forwarded
- Properly unsubscribe deltas when all snapshot intervals are removed
